title: DAZ3D - Eagle-Guard Torso Armor and Kilt for Genesis 3
description:
Eagle-Guard Torso Armor and Kilt for G3M/F
------------------------------------------
 
https://cdn.pximg.xyz/ba46bf4a05fa3b7dd6ec0d325503070d.jpg

www.daz3d.com/catalog/product/view/id/34321

The EagleGuard Torso Armor and Kilts were designed to fit your Genesis 3 Female(s) and Genesis 3 Male(s). It comes with full Torsoarmor (consisting of three separate pieces), Chestcovers for the males, and two sets of Armored kilts which can be used separately or together for a layered look. All pieces were created to fit seamlessly with the EagleGuard Armorglove, and some of the promotional renders show all these pieces together as an ensemble. However, the Armorgloves are NOT included in this set! You will get four full texture based materials for both 3Delight and Iray plus partial option to mix and match colors and styles. Presets to hide/show arm and hand pieces, left and ride sides are included as well. Easy customization is provided by extensive hide/show utilities for both 3Delight and Iray. You can use them on arms and hands, divided by side, or on hands or arms only. Twelve additional metal options, created by Shox-Design complete this set. Full and partial material options are included
